Ingredients.9: 1 (28 ounce) jar tomato sauce, or as needed

Directions.1: Beat milk and egg together in a large bowl. Mix bread crumbs in until a paste forms. Add ground beef, onion, garlic, and parsley, and mix with your hands until just combined.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat a baking sheet with cooking spray.

Directions.3: Measure meatballs using an ice cream scoop. Roll balls with dampened hands and place on the prepared baking sheet

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until meatballs are no longer pink in the center and an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 30 minutes.

Directions.5: While meatballs bake, heat tomato sauce in saucepan over medium heat.

Directions.6: Add baked meatballs to the sauce and simmer, uncovered, for 30 minutes.
